amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 116-61 to add a duty requiring navigators to provide information in plain language regarding essential health benefits and consumer protections under the mental health and substance use disorder benefits parity law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Deutch amendment (A017) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Deutch.
